price: 32. Ô peuple mien, je crains pour vous le jour de l’Appel Réciproque,[460]
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلتَّنَادِ
footnotes: [460] Le Jour du Jugement, les hommes s’interpelleront et s’interrogeront mutuellement.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi innī akhāfu ʿalaykum yawma al-tanādi
